name: Card & Effect
description:
Submission for Ludum Dare 41. Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres 

I chose to combine FPS and CCG after staring intensely at my Battle.net client.

Your deck contains cards with different effects. Play them wisely to avoid getting killed.

Linux build not tested.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • R to reload
  • Esc to open menu

Whew! the first (non-mini) Ludum Dare I completed! Took heavy inspiration from Devil Daggers since the scope of its core gameplay felt doable in a game jam time period (not to mention it's hella fun!).
